The game has a lot of personality with plenty of customization options for each one of the classes. The gameplay is topnotch and is the core reason for the game's staying power. Each class has something for everyone to enjoy and practice with whether it be ambassador(Primary Revolver) sniping with the spy or being a market gardening(Melee Weapon) montage soldier this game has something for you to enjoy!
Love it I really like the class personalities! :3
Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities. Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats!

I love this game if u want a real super funny game that is AWESOME then you should download TeamFortress 2 and best of all its Free 2 Play! :D

Team Fortress 2 is a free-to-play FPS where a team of players must fight the oposite team over objectives like payloads or control points. 

Made by Valve, most people will argue that it's a dead game which rarely gets updated with poor updates. And they would be right. TF2 is an old game and it is beginning to feel its years. The engine isn't great, the balance of overpowered/underpowered weapons is far from perfect and hackers are a common issue. That coupled with the lack of updates improving things such as the match-maker or something as simple as the hud makes it hard to understand why someone would play this game.

But come on, I wouldn't have around 1500 hours on it if it was that bad.
The truth is that this game, despite the lack of proper attention from Valve, is incredible. I could go on about the 9 diverse classes with developed and lovable personalities, the capacity to support an infinite number of loadouts and weapon combinations, the incredibly high and complex skill ceiling, the user friendly gameplay that opens the door for new players to understand the basics extremely easily, the fun co-op mode, the infinite amount of customization allowed to each character or even the beautiful community that keeps this game alive. But I wont.
This game is easily my favourite game of all time. I spent hours and hours with my friends just having fun, tryharding on some random server or even playing the competitive mode, and it isn't something I can really explain.

To sum it all up, this game is amazing. It's fun, engaging and easy to learn. I would recommend this game to everyone from gaming noobies to the common Call of Duty MLG quick-scoper.

一款垃圾遊戲可以讓我玩了過千小時 到底??

Honestly, from the drops, to Casual, Community Servers and the Marketplace, Team Fortress 2 has so much going for it in the way of having fun. Cosmetics, hats, weapons (Valve give us MORE ALREADY), Mann Vs Machine, there is just so much content in a Free-To-Play system. I joined back after a 4 year hiatus, not knowing what to expect.. mainly a lot of dancing, taunting, trolling and some mic-spamming kids, but at the very back was that Community I always knew and loved.

GMod and SFM keep passionate people doing the thing they love most, the Pro's writing guides on how to main certain classes or class builds, and the dance-off's that ensue on 2Fort almost hourly, this is a game that can't die. I may only have 600 hours, but those 600 hours in the last 2 months have been pure fun and enjoyment. Meeting new people, discovering new things, using tactics and strategy to overcome an opposing team (Or Mann-Up MvM), the possibilities in this game are endless. I'm sure I could mention to negatives, but with any game there are bound to be some, it's all subjective to player and how he handles himself in a match.

Not to mention you have an easy access to cosmetics, hats, weapons either from the Market. Got a hat you don't want that is strange? Sell it, it's bound to be gone the minute you put it up for sale.

All this in mind, I'm staying TF2 for the long run, I've got 4 other IRL friends to join with me and since them coming on, haven't turned back! I Highly recommend this game to anyone wanting to just have fun, meet new people, and feel accomplished playing a game that has a rather high skill ceiling!

After all these years, i still love playing this game but ever since i took a small break (A few months) and then came back to it, it seems like TF2 has changed quite a bit. Like i said, i still love it but its no way near as good as what it is. I'd still recommend it to anyone though.

Certamente um ótimo jogo com uma ótima mecanica e certamente bem unico, Apesar do tempo gasto na criação do game, o game esteve e continua a agradar milhoes de jogadores e com razao, muito dificil de se jogar, oq torna cada classe uma experiencia ainda mais unica, fazendo com oque o jogador sempre queira explorar e aprender cada vez mais, fazendo assim com que o mesmo não se enjoe facilmente.
别具一格的画风，人物性格各有不同，再加上source filmmaker在YouTube上的大光异彩（当然还有Garry's mo【噗】}）这个游戏已经成为了不可磨灭的游戏历史，我相信这游戏值得我花一些时间在它身上来体验它给我带来的乐趣。

Hra ponúka veľké množstvo herných módov a zábavy hlavne v skupine s priateľmi. K dispozícií je veľké množstvo skinov, itemov, tauntov a podobne. Väčšinu z týchto vecí dostávate hraním, čiže nie je nutné si ich kupovať, alebo vycraftovať vašu vysnenú zbraň. Získať prémium účet je možné aj za nákup najlacnejšej veci v obchode (mimo komunitného trhu).

CALIFICACION 8/10 (lo unico negativo son las microtransacciones y que exista la posibilidad de hacer grupos con tus amigos para entrar juntos a partidas)

Es un juego muy entretenido, la competencia es genial, los gráficos son amenos, los personajes muy divertidos. LO ÚNICO MALO es que NO SE PUEDEN HACER GRUPOS para entrar todos tus amigos juntos a partidas. Juegos como PALADINS lo tiene, porque un juego de valve como este no podría hacerlo ?.

Это не игра, это шедевер. Игра затянула с 2015 года, мвм, казуал, и вишенка на торте - паблики. Это тонна новых эмоций, и режимов придуманных игроками, джаил, сакстон мод ( FF2 вроде как ) и еще много интересного. Но на данный момент очень жалко, что в ней не выходят крупные обновления, и не факт что когда либо выйдут, что очень печально. Спасибо Вэлв за 4 года эмоций.
